name: Zombie Dungeon Dice
description:
**READ ALL PLS**

You are trapped in a zombie dungeon.

when the timer in the top right goes down, the dice will roll, and what it lands on decides what weapon you will get.

How Long Can You Survive?

*Note: sometimes the game won't work. just reload the page.

**Double Note: sorry about the timer. It's buggy but still accurate. Ill fix it if anyone cares. (Game jam code, amirite)

WEAPONS:

1 - spoon. very useless. probably better to run.

2 - sword. very good. kills in one hit

3 - gun. 2-shot kills zombies, 1-shots skeletons

4 - traps. place down spikes that instakill enemies

5 - flamethrower. effective on zombies, skeletons are harder.

6 - freeze ray. turn enemies into blocks of ice and kill them later!

CONTROLS:

WASD - move

space or click - use weapon

esc - return to menu

ctrl - toggle ez mode. ez mode makes the game spawn fewer enemies. good for new players. (When in ez mode an "EZ" icon will appear below the dice)

(Walk to start button to begin)

made using ct.js game engine

art made by me

sounds made with sfxr

made for gmtk game jam 2022
